feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission demonstrates a working financial tool: it fetches stock/earnings data (EPS and other metrics) via Alpha Vantage, analyzes weaknesses in plain English, and writes outputs to a spreadsheet. The DISCOVER and IMPLEMENT evidence show both intent and execution, and REFLECT shows iterative refinement, meeting the criterion for a functioning financial application.
- Integrate AI: The submission shows concrete AI integration (OpenAI agent) that processes external data (Alpha Vantage), formats human-readable analyses, and stores outputs (Google Sheets), demonstrating added value beyond superficial use. Implementation details and reflective plans indicate a thorough, working integration consistent with the DRIVER stages.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "So for the third mini project, I decided to create an earnings/reent news analyzer that would take stocks and create conclusions of some of their weakest points."
"then we link the API and their credentials as well as build the brain for the AI agent telling which URL to use for the alpha vantage API to replace the ticker based on the students input"
"These are all numbers from pulled from the alpha vantage API."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover (problem understood: building an earnings/news analyzer for stocks), Implement (linked Alpha Vantage API and built the AI agent to fetch and process financial data), Reflect (iterated to add Google Sheets, noted limitations of free API and potential improvements).
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates a working financial tool: it fetches stock/earnings data (EPS and other metrics) via Alpha Vantage, analyzes weaknesses in plain English, and writes outputs to a spreadsheet. The DISCOVER and IMPLEMENT evidence show both intent and execution, and REFLECT shows iterative refinement, meeting the criterion for a functioning financial application.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "My goals for his for this was to create an app that can take advantage that can take the Alpha Vantage API and analyze recent stock news and earnings numbers to determine business's weakness and explain them in colloquial student English."
"then we link the API and their credentials as well as build the brain for the AI agent telling which URL to use for the alpha vantage API to replace the ticker based on the students input"

"it has the weaknesses stored here in more of a colloquial English also using part of the AI brain to give a more serviceable output not just numbers but also practice practicable effects and how this would affect stock price"
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover — articulated the problem and goals (identify data sources and desired AI outputs). Implement — described linking APIs, building the AI agent "brain," and integrating OpenAI + Alpha Vantage + Google Sheets. Reflect — noted limitations (free API constraints) and proposed iterative improvements (memory, paid APIs, further loops).
criteria.reasoning: The submission shows concrete AI integration (OpenAI agent) that processes external data (Alpha Vantage), formats human-readable analyses, and stores outputs (Google Sheets), demonstrating added value beyond superficial use. Implementation details and reflective plans indicate a thorough, working integration consistent with the DRIVER stages.
